product_summary: Akita.ai is a context-aware chatbot for your codebase designed for developers by developers to help you interact with your code using artificial intelligence. Akita.ai offers features such as real-time documentation generation, intelligent code summarization, automated code review, and a context-aware chatbot (Akita Assistant). Akita.ai is multilingual, and its plugin system enables customization and extension.
product_pros: Automatic generation of concise codebase summaries
AI-driven code reviews for improved code quality
Meaningful dialogue with your codebase through Akita Assistant

product_usecases.details: Ask the Akita Assistant anything about your codebase and get clear, context-aware explanations.
Highlight potential issues in your code and receive suggestions for improvements.
Automatically generate documentation for your code to enhance understanding and maintainability.
Easily navigate your codebase and quickly find the information you need.
Get suggestions for refactoring your code to improve its structure and organization.

product_toolfor.details: Akita.ai is designed for developers who want to improve their productivity and code quality.
Akita.ai can help teams collaborate more effectively by providing a shared understanding of the codebase.
Akita.ai can help open source projects improve their documentation and make it easier for contributors to understand the codebase.
Akita.ai can help students learn to code by providing them with real-time feedback and explanations.

product_toolfor.target: Anyone who wants to improve their coding skills
product_toolfor.details: Akita.ai can help anyone who wants to improve their coding skills by providing them with a powerful tool that can help them learn and understand code.
